Margin

# Margin

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class           | Support        |
| --------------- | -------------- |
| ```
m-{n}
```   | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
m-[n]
```   | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
mx-{n}
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
mx-[n]
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
my-{n}
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
my-[n]
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
mt-{n}
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
mt-[n]
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
mr-{n}
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
mr-[n]
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
mb-{n}
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
mb-[n]
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
ml-{n}
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
ml-[n]
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
m-auto
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
mx-auto
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
my-auto
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
mt-auto
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
mr-auto
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
mb-auto
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
ml-auto
``` | ✅ Full Support |
